languages.text: "Ты продолжаешь коситься на меня, мон-кай. Напрасно — твой гнев слишком пресный для меня. И вдобавок предсказуемый — достаточно спросить, с какой части надо начинать разделывать твоего зверя..."
"You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."
languages.original_text: "Ты продолжаешь коситься на меня, мон-кай. Напрасно — твой гнев слишком пресный для меня. И вдобавок предсказуемый — достаточно спросить, с какой части надо начинать разделывать твоего зверя..."

traits.locale_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but it will not work. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."
"You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but it will not work. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."
"You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but it will not work. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."
"You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."
"You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

languages.text: 「そんなに睨まなくてもいいぞ、モン＝ケイ。お前が心配することなんて何もない。お前の怒りなんて、味気なさすぎて退屈だ。それに、実にわかりやすい。お前の獣のどの部位から切り落としてやるか、訊いてやるだけでいいんだからな…」
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに睨まなくてもいいぞ、モン＝ケイ。お前が心配することなんて何もない。お前の怒りなんて、味気なさすぎて退屈だ。それに、実にわかりやすい。お前の獣のどの部位から切り落としてやるか、訊いてやるだけでいいんだからな…」

languages.text: "Ihr starrt mich an, Chem-Pan-Sey, aber Ihr habt keinerlei Grund zur Sorge. Euer Zorn ist langweilig. Und vorhersehbar. Ich muss nur fragen, welchen Teil Eures Haustiers ich als Erstes abschneiden solle ..."
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr starrt mich an, Chem-Pan-Sey, aber Ihr habt keinerlei Grund zur Sorge. Euer Zorn ist langweilig. Und vorhersehbar. Ich muss nur fragen, welchen Teil Eures Haustiers ich als Erstes abschneiden solle ..."

languages.text: « Inutile de me tenir à l'œil, mon-keigh, vous n'avez pas à vous préoccuper de moi. Votre colère est trop fade à mon goût. Trop prévisible, aussi. Il me suffit de demander quelle partie de votre animal je devrais trancher en premier... »
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de me tenir à l'œil, mon-keigh, vous n'avez pas à vous préoccuper de moi. Votre colère est trop fade à mon goût. Trop prévisible, aussi. Il me suffit de demander quelle partie de votre animal je devrais trancher en premier... »

languages.text: «No me quitas el ojo de encima, mon-keigh, pero no tienes motivos para preocuparte. Tu furia es demasiado insulsa para mí. Por no decir predecible; basta con preguntarte qué parte de tu bestia quieres que corte primero...».
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: «No me quitas el ojo de encima, mon-keigh, pero no tienes motivos para preocuparte. Tu furia es demasiado insulsa para mí. Por no decir predecible; basta con preguntarte qué parte de tu bestia quieres que corte primero...».

languages.text: “你一直在盯着我看，猴子，但你其实不用担心。对我而言，你的怒火实在是太过肤浅，太过一目了然。如果想惹怒你，我只要问一句，应该先把你那条畜生的哪部分切掉……”
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: “你一直在盯着我看，猴子，但你其实不用担心。对我而言，你的怒火实在是太过肤浅，太过一目了然。如果想惹怒你，我只要问一句，应该先把你那条畜生的哪部分切掉……”

languages.text: "Dik dik bakıp duruyorsun mon-keigh ama korkacak bir şey yok. Öfken bana vız gelir, senin gibileri iyi bilirim. Yalnız şunu sorayım: İtini neresinden söğüşlemeye başlayayım?"
languages.original_text: "You keep glaring at me, mon-keigh, but you have nothing to worry about. Your anger is too bland for me. And predictable — I just have to ask which part of your beast I should cut off first..."

traits.locale_text: "Dik dik bakıp duruyorsun mon-keigh ama korkacak bir şey yok. Öfken bana vız gelir, senin gibileri iyi bilirim. Yalnız şunu sorayım: İtini neresinden söğüşlemeye başlayayım?"
